posts.name: Venkat Varadarajan
posts.cooked: I see my Programming Quiz1 scores in my dashboard. Is this for ROE1? If so when will the project 1 scores be update?

posts.name: Saransh Saini
posts.cooked: Yes thats the ROE and yes project scores will be updated they are 20% of the final score why wont they.

posts.name: Venkat Varadarajan
posts.cooked: Thanks. Do you know the timeline when they will update the project scores?

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: All scores will updated with corrections on Friday 16th of August, 2024.

posts.name: Venkat Varadarajan
posts.cooked:
Hello Mr. Carlton,
When will the scores for TDS Programming Quiz1 be update on the dashboard?

posts.name: Sarath E
posts.cooked: Its already visible for me .I think it was there for few days now.

posts.name: Rajat Shenoi
posts.cooked:
carlton:

All scores will updated with corrections on Friday 16th of August, 2024.

Hi, I don’t see the scores for Project 1 yet. Kindly confirm if it is not available for anyone or only me.

posts.name: Venkat Varadarajan
posts.cooked: Sorry I meant Project 1 scores not the Programming Quiz1. I don’t see the scores on the dashboard.
